rukus.text: thæcring rea di sng nuhˌ pi yang hmu chn khxng khea (doy baycha wa) cea cng takteuxn hmu chn khxng cea kxn thi kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd ca ma thung phwk khea
khea klaw wa xo hmu chn khxng chan xey thæcring chan khux phu takteuxn xan chad cæng khxng phwk than
phwk than cng khea rph phakdi xallxhˌ theid læa cng yakerng phraxngkh læa lng cheuxfang ptibati tam chan

phraxngkh ca thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk than nı khwam phid khxng phwk than læa ca thrng phxnphan phwk than cnkrathang thung wara thi thuk kahnd wi thæcring wara khx ngxallxhˌ nan meux ma thung læw man ca mi yud wela tx pi xik hak phwk than di ru
khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh thæcring kha phraxngkh di reiyk rxng cheiy chwn hmu chn khxng kha phraxngkh thang klangkhun læa klangwan
tæ kar reiyk rxng cheiy chwn khxng kha phraxngkh midi pheimphun sing dı kæ khea nxkcak kar hlb hni

Læa thæcring thuk khrang thi kha phraxngkh reiyk rxng cheiy chwn phwk khea pheux thi phraxngkh than ca di xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk khea phwk khea k xea niw xud ru hu khxng phwk khea læa xea seuxpha khxng phwk khea khlumpong læa phwk khea yang dux ran læa hying yso dwy khwam cxnghxng
khran læw kha phraxngkh di reiyk rxng cheiy chwn phwk khea xyang peidphey
læw kha phraxngkh di prakas kæ phwk khea xyang peidphey xik thang kha phraxngkh yang di bxkklaw kæ phwk khea xyang lab«xik dwy
kha phraxngkh di klaw wa phwk than cng khxxphay thosʹ tx phracea khxng phwk than theid pheraa thæcring phraxngkh thrng pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ xyang thæcring
phraxngkh ca thrng hlang na fn xyang makmay kæ phwk than
læa phraxngkh ca thrng pheimphun thraphysin læa luk hlan kæ phwk than læa ca thrng thahı mi swn mak hlay kæ phwk than læa ca thrng thahı mi lana mak hlay kæ phwk than
thami phwk than thung mi sanuk thung khwam ying hıy khx ngxallxhˌ
læa doy nænxn phraxngkh thrng srang phwk than tam ladab khan txn
phwk cea mi hen dxk hrux wa phraxngkh thrng srang chan fa thang ced pen chan«xyangri
læa phraxngkh thrng thahı dwng canthr nı chan fa hela nan mi sængswang læa thrng thahı dwng xathity mi sæng ca
læa xallxhˌ thrng bangkeid phwk than ma cak phændin chen phuch phak
læw thrng thahı phwk than klabkhun su phændin læa ca thrng hı phwk than xxk ma xik pheux khunchiph
læa xallxhˌ thrng thahı phændin ni rabreiyb kwanghıy sahrab phwk than
pheux phwk than ca di saycr pi ma tam phunthi long kwang nan
